name: Search Mines Wear - Watch game
description:
Search for mines in this minimal game for iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch.

The game consists in clearing all the squares, cercles and triangles that don't hide a mine. The boxes have a number, which indicates the number of mines in the nearby cells. If a mine is discovered, the game is lost.

For Apple Watch there are 3 levels:
Easy -> 6x6 / 7x7 and 3 mines
Normal -> 6x6 / 7x7 and 6 mines
Difficult -> 6x6 / 7x7 and 10 mines

For iPhone / iPad, 4 levels:
Easy -> 5×5 and 3 mines
Normal -> 8×8 and 10 mines
Difficult -> 10×10 and 20 mines
Extreme -> 15×15 and 80 mines

Let's play with the Apple Watch!
